AbUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
Unlike others, I am a blacksmith who can refine items without breaking them!
I refine items that are
^CC0000+7 to +9^000000. with ^0000CCEnriched Elunium^000000 and ^00CC00Enriched Oridecon^000000 and 20,000z fee.
My specialty is that even if my refining ^FF0000 fails, the level decreases by just 1 level without losing the gear^000000. Isn't it great?
AbUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
Unlike others, I am a blacksmith who can refine items without breaking them!
I refine items that are
^0000AA+7 to +9^000000. with ^0000FFEnriched Elunium^000000 and ^990099Enriched Oridecon^000000 and 20,000z fee.
My specialty is that even if my refining ^FF0000 fails, the level decreases by just 1 level without losing the gear^000000. Isn't it great?

ArUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
By happenstance I can also use the '^CC0000Safe to +7' certificates^000000 along with Elunium-Oridecon to make the attempts from 4 to 6 safe.
So lets kick this into overdrive, what d' ya say?
ArUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
By happenstance I can also use the '^0000AASafe to +7' certificates^000000 along with Elunium-Oridecon to make the attempts from 4 to 6 safe.
So lets kick this into overdrive, what d' ya say?

A7UmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
I will use the enriched rate for my upgrade and have a 20,000 zeny fee.
A7UmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
I will use the enriched rate for my upgrade and have a 20,000 zeny fee.

BLUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This item can't be refined.
BLUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This item can't be refined.

BbUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This item can't be refined because it has not been identified.
BbUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This item can't be refined because it has not been identified.

BrUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
I can only work in ^0000CCHD Ore^000000 right now. I need
the {} to be ^CC0000+7 or higher^000000
to start my upgrading attempts using ^0000CCHD Elu/Ori^000000.
BrUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
I can only work in ^0000FFHD Ore^000000 right now. I need
the {} to be ^0000AA+7 or higher^000000
to start my upgrading attempts using ^0000FFHD Elu/Ori^000000.

B7UmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
Or Elu/Ori + and a '^CC0000Safe to 7 Certificate^000000' to work on items that are 4, 5 or 6.
B7UmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
Or Elu/Ori + and a '^0000AASafe to 7 Certificate^000000' to work on items that are 4, 5 or 6.

CLUmBg.en:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This is higher than +6, so you can now use my HD Stone services!  I need to switch my tools, please give me a moment.
CLUmBg.pt:
[Blacksmith Enriched Hammer]
This is higher than +6, so you can now use my HD Stone services!  I need to switch my tools, please give me a moment.

HbUmBg.en:
^0000CCThe sound of success refreshes my mind anytime I hear it.^000000
Shall we go again?

HrUmBg.en:
^CC0000By Odin's beard that was bad luck!!^000000
Well I failed, but it is the same level as before, do you want to try and upgrade again?
